_header: A little in the morning nothing at noon
Note:
See 6015; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 21

BLHar2321.Transcription: A little in þe morninge nothing at nooneAnd a light supper doth mak to liue longe
BLHar2321.Note: Added to lower margin by a later hand.
BLHar2321.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.208.
